verses.roman:
nija-gaṇa lañā prabhu kahe hāsya kari'
kāśīte āmi āilāṅa vecite bhāvakāli

synonyms: nija-gaṇa lañā—with His personal associates; prabhu kahe—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; hāsya kari'-laughingly; kāśīte—in Kāśī; āmi āilāṅa—I came; vecite—to sell; bhāvakāli—emotional ecstatic love.
translation: Among His own associates, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu laughingly said, "I came here to sell My emotional ecstatic love.
